Uses of Interface
agents.org.apache.commons.math.linear.RealMatrix

  • Packages that use RealMatrix 
    Package Description
    agents.org.apache.commons.math.linear
    Linear algebra support.
    agents.org.apache.commons.math.ode
    This package provides classes to solve Ordinary Differential Equations problems.
    agents.org.apache.commons.math.optimization
    This package provides common interfaces for the optimization algorithms provided in sub-packages.
    agents.org.apache.commons.math.random
    Random number and random data generators.
    agents.org.apache.commons.math.stat.correlation
    Correlations/Covariance computations.
    agents.org.apache.commons.math.stat.descriptive
    Generic univariate summary statistic objects.
    agents.org.apache.commons.math.stat.descriptive.moment
    Summary statistics based on moments.
    agents.org.apache.commons.math.stat.regression
    Statistical routines involving multivariate data.

    • Uses of RealMatrix in agents.org.apache.commons.math.linear

      Subinterfaces of RealMatrix in agents.org.apache.commons.math.linear 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  SparseRealMatrix
      Marker interface for RealMatrix implementations that require sparse backing storage
      Classes in agents.org.apache.commons.math.linear that implement RealMatrix 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractRealMatrix
      Basic implementation of RealMatrix methods regardless of the underlying storage.
      class  Array2DRowRealMatrix
      Implementation of RealMatrix using a double[][] array to store entries and LU decomposition to support linear system solution and inverse.
      class  BlockRealMatrix
      Cache-friendly implementation of RealMatrix using a flat arrays to store square blocks of the matrix.
      class  OpenMapRealMatrix
      Sparse matrix implementation based on an open addressed map.
      class  RealMatrixImpl
      Deprecated. 
      as of 2.0 replaced by Array2DRowRealMatrix
